title: Cognitive Load and Satisfaction Optimization Strategies in Online Simulation Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific theories and job-related foundational skills
context.additional_context: Simulation-Based Practical Environment for Professionals in Healthcare, Legal, and Technical Fields. BYOD Policy Allows Individual Device Use

learning_goals: Learners can utilize three tools to measure cognitive load in online simulation environments.
Learners can analyze and improve at least two cognitive load factors when designing VR-based learning scenarios.
By the end of the course, over 80% of learners achieve a score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) in learning satisfaction surveys.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
